node.title: BitTorrent (BTT) Supported by Plisio Cryptocurrency Payment Gateway
node.content:
We are pleased to announce that Plisio supports BitTorrent Token (BTT), enabling small companies, mid-market businesses, and large enterprises to accept BTT. Plisio is a leading cryptocurrency payment gateway that enables easy payment fulfillment across a growing list of cryptocurrencies, including BTC, ETH, XMR, ZEC, LTC, DASH, TUSD, USDT, BTT and others. 

Through the use of shopping plugins, Plisio helps businesses using existing ecommerce platforms like WooCommerce, Magento, OpenCart, BigCommerce, X-Cart and others, to add BTT as a payment option.

We’re pleased to announce that businesses can now accept BTT through their commercial websites and mobile apps using our simple API and tools,” said a Plisio team representative. “Given the sheer size of the BitTorrent community, BTT users now have more opportunities to shop with thousands of businesses around the world.”

With the help of white label solutions, merchants have a full range of personalization options and control, including the ability to use their own design and logo for invoices. Plisio also allows for a more seamless sales process, since customers aren’t redirected to other websites during checkout. 

For businesses interested in learning more, please visit https://plisio.net for more information.
